game.name: Pitty Meaty
game.shortDescription: 피티 고기는 무시 무시한,부어 시체 머리의 지속적인 위협에서 위험한 지역에서 생존해야하는 끔찍한 크리 피파 스타 서바이벌 호러 게임이다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pitty Meaty is a horrifying creepypasta survival horror game where you must survive in a dangerous territory under the constant threat of a menacing, swollen corpse head.

reviewHighlights.text: I was an incel, and had no jawline, but after i played Pitty Meaty, my jawline became as sharp as a knife, and all the girls swarmed me
It's a fun game, somewhat reminiscent of Baldi graphics. It scared me a couple of times. it may seem monotonous, but it's not.
